title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry pancetta. 3. Beat eggs and mix with cheese. 4. Combine all with pasta. 5. Serve with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth, buttery & creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka paste. 2. Cook onions. 3. Add tomato puree and cream. 4. Add chicken and simmer until cooked.

title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
summary: Creamy avocado on toasted sourdough with chili flakes and olive oil.
instructions: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado with salt. 3. Spread on toast. 4. Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle chili flakes.
